Package com.igormaznitsa.prol.io

The package contains classes to work with input-output streams from the engine.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ProlStream The interface describes an abstract stream object which can be used by the prol engine
ProlStreamManager The interface describes an object which can be used to create reader and writer streams to be used by a prol engine
ProlTextReader The interface describea s prol text reader i.e.
ProlTextWriter The interface describes a prol writer allows to output terms
 

Class Summary
DefaultProlStreamManagerImpl The class implements the ProlStreamManager interface and can be used to read-write files and read resources from JAR
ProlMemoryPipe The class describes a memory pipe which is the object allows input-output operations in memory buffer.
ProlTextInputStream The class implements a text input stream which is used by a prol engine to read from an input stream.
ProlTextOutputStream The class describes a text input stream which is used by a prol engine to write texts and chars into an input stream.
 

Package com.igormaznitsa.prol.io Description

The package contains classes to work with input-output streams from the engine.
